Chopper [2000] (90mins) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0221073/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0221073/</a>
Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read,
a Legendary Criminal who wrote his Autobiography while
serving a Jail Sentence in Prison. His book,
"From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was
a Best-Seller.
 <a href="
http://i.imgur.com/kQhsSW1.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i.imgur.com/kQhsSW1.jpg</a>

Fat Belly Chopper Unchopped [2009] (74mins) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2880528/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2880528/</a>
A documentary profile of Mark 'Chopper' Read, one of
Australia's most notorious criminals. The film charts
the life of the cult hero, from his time in mental
hospitals, via his horrific murders, to the years
spent in Australia's harsh Pentridge Prison.
 <a href="
http://i.imgur.com/koQF6Fw.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i.imgur.com/koQF6Fw.jpg</a>

Heath Franklins Chopper Harden The F#ck Up Australia [2010]
(68mins)
Starring Heath Franklin as Chopper and Mini-Chopper as
Mini-Chopper from TVs The Ronnie Johns Half Hour.
Sometimes life seems a bit tough, and you just feel like
finding a quiet corner and having a cry. Well it's times
like these that Chopper thinks you should take off your
skirt, grow a moustache and harden the f**k up. From the
2007 record breaking sell-out national tour, Harden the
F#ck Up Australia is the 'oppression we had to have'.
Through audience participation, multi-media presentations,
a foul mouthed puppet, and extreme but justifiable violence,
Chopper takes no Prisoners as he Head Butts his way through
the spectrum of Hard and Soft, from The Smurfs, hands free
mobiles, mangoes, Switzerland, to anti-smoking ads, even
Darth Vader gets punch in the soft guts by the Ambassador
of Hard. So, if you didn't get a chance to see the show,
or you want to see it again because you went out for a beer
or a whizz and missed a bit, this Encode is for you... and
it's the safest way to have Chopper in your Living Room.
 <a href="
http://i.imgur.com/ttn9EDd.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i.imgur.com/ttn9EDd.png</a>

Heath Franklins Chopper In The Shitlist Live In New Zealand [2013] (44mins)

Australia's Most Wanted comedian Chopper is fizzing at
the bumhole to be back in on the road, and this time,
he's brought a big pad of paper with your name on it.

Some people have a shopping list. Some have a To-Do list.
Chopper has a Shitlist. It's like Santa's naughty and nice
list; but with more sack, and no one is getting toys.

Restaurant serves your Dinner Cold. Put it on the Shitlist.
